page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content:
Little Weighton,in the Parish of Rowley,is a small rural village.The nearest towns are Beverley(10km) and Hull(12km) and many of the villagers travel to these towns to work.Beverley is becoming popular with tourists and Little Weighton has one of the few camping/caravan sites in the area which is an indication of its picturesque qualities. The population is not dominated by any particular age group.There are quite good facilities for a village of its size(pop.900),and there are good facilities for shopping and recreation within short distances from the village,although private transport is becoming more of a necessity in order to take advantage of them.
